meaning: تَحِيَّةٌ شَائِعَةٌ تُرَدُّ عَلَى النَّاسِ عِنْدَ التَّرَحْيب
translation: A common greeting exchanged among people as a form of welcome

meaning: تَحِيَّةٌ تُقَالُ عِنْدَ اللُّقْاءِ فِي الصَّبَاحِ
translation: A greeting said when meeting in the morning

meaning: تَحِيَّةٌ تُقَالُ لِلشَّخْصِ الَّذِي تُضِيءُ حَيَاتُهُ وَتُفَرِّحُهُ
translation: A greeting said to someone who brightens your life and makes you happy

meaning: تَحِيَّةٌ تُقَالُ عِنْدَ اللُّقْاءِ فِي الْمَسَاءِ
translation: A greeting said when meeting in the evening

meaning: تَحِيَّةٌ تُقَالُ لِلشَّخْصِ الَّذِي يُضِيءُ لَكَ اللَّيْلَ وَيَفْرِحُكَ
translation: A greeting said to someone who brightens your night and makes you happy

meaning: تَرَحُّبٌ بِشَخْصٍ مَا عِنْدَ قِدُومِهِ أَو تَوَاجُدِهِ
translation: A welcome to someone upon their arrival or presence

meaning: تَرَحُّبٌ بِشَخْصٍ مَا عِنْدَ قِدُومِهِ أَو تَوَاجُدِهِ
translation: A welcome to someone upon their arrival or presence

meaning: تَحِيَّةٌ تُرَدُّ عِنْدَ لُقَاءِ شَخْصٍ
translation: A greeting said when meeting someone

meaning: تَرَحُّبٌ بِشَخْصٍ عِنْدَ قِدُومِهِ أَو تَوَاجُدِهِ
translation: A welcome to someone upon their arrival or presence

meaning: سُؤَالٌ عَنْ حَالَةِ الشَّخْص
translation: A question about someone's well-being

meaning: سُؤَالٌ عَنْ حَالَةِ الشَّخْص
translation: A question about someone's well-being

vocabulary.en: I'm fine, thanks be to God:
meaning: جَوَابٌ يُقَالُ لِلدَّلَالَةِ عَلَى أَنَّ الشَّخْص بِخَيْرٍ وَمُمْتِنٌ
translation: A response indicating that the person is fine and thankful

meaning: سُؤَالٌ عَنِ الاسْمِ الشَّخْصِي
translation: A question about the person's name

meaning: جَوَابٌ يُقَالُ لِلدَّلَالَةِ عَلَى اسْمِ الشَّخْص
translation: A response indicating the person's name

meaning: إِعْرَابٌ عَنِ امْتِنَانٍ وَسُرُورٍ لِلْقَاءِ الشَّخْص
translation: An expression of gratitude and joy for meeting the person

meaning: إِعْرَابٌ عَنِ امْتِنَانٍ وَسُرُورٍ لِلْقَاءِ الشَّخْص
translation: An expression of gratitude and joy for meeting the person

meaning: فُرْصَةٌ جَيِّدَةٌ لِشَيْءٍ مَعِيِّن
translation: A good chance or opportunity for something specific

meaning: فُرْصَةٌ تَجْلِبُ السَّعَادَة
translation: An opportunity that brings happiness

meaning: سُؤَالٌ عَن جِنْسِيَّةِ الشَّخْص
translation: A question about a person's nationality

meaning: إِعْلَانٌ عَن الجِنْسِيَّةِ الشَّخْصِيَّة
translation: A declaration of personal nationality

meaning: سُؤَالٌ عَن مَكَانِ النَّشْأَةِ
translation: A question about a person's place of origin

meaning: إِعْلَانٌ عَن مَكَانِ النَّشْأَةِ
translation: A declaration of place of origin
